name: Companion (itch) (Akadream)
description:
Companion is an Action RPG game where you have to reach the exit of the dungeon along with your companion.

Your armor protect you of slimes attacks, but your companion take damages. So you need to protect him ! (slimes are only focusing the companion)
Your companion is constantly following you, but take care if you block him between 2 walls, he might lose sight of you.

Controls :
*  Arrows (Left, Right Up, Down) : Movements
*  X : Sword attack
*  C : Open Chest
*  R : Respawn (when you'r dead)

If you reach the end of the dungeon, just close the game :)

Greetings :
*  Akadream : The game has been made only by me. I've been somewhat inspired of some pixel art on the web, but every pixel of all assets have been placed by me. I'm not a pixel artist, so it was pretty hard and took me a long time to do many things but it was a good experience.

Hope you'll enjoy the game.
Feel free to give some feebacks. I'll probably finish the game developement in the future, so i have to make it better !
